Detailed Description

This class represents a TinyJava binary expression involving a binary operator and 2 operand expressions.

A binary expression is represented by:

  • an operator (which may be an arithmetic, relational, or equality operator)
  • a left expression subtree representing the left operand, and
  • a right expression subtree representing the right operand.

Create a new BinaryExpression object.

Parameters:

op an int value representing the operator; it should be one of the constants defined in the AstNode class
left an Expression representing the left operand
right an Expression representing the right operand
Exceptions:
AstException if either the left operand or the right operand is NULL
